node.html:
• Developed and delivered secure digital banking applications used by millions of customers across Libya.
  • Improved mobile performance by over 25% and supported continuous releases on iOS & Android.
  • Solved critical issues in production, reducing crash rates and user complaints significantly.
  • Worked closely with product owners and bank stakeholders to refine and deliver high-impact features.
  • Implemented secure user authentication, digital wallets, merchant payments, and real-time notifications.

• Worked with the engineering team on backend diagnostics and system optimization tasks.
  • Contributed to maintenance & monitoring while coordinating timelines with ongoing product work at Masarat.
  • Documented findings and helped improve operational reliability and performance.

• Supported daily data migration operations and verified transactional data consistency.
  • Gained exposure to banking IT infrastructure and operational data pipelines.
  • Assisted with validation, logging, and reporting during migration windows.

• Supported AMAN Bank’s transition to Oracle FLEXCUBE & Oracle Digital Banking (Arabic rollout).
  • Led UAT, systems integration, and payments migration; coordinated with users & international teams.
  • Assisted integrations with ECC, RTGS, ACH, and SWIFT; delivered training and QA for banking systems.

• Led the IT department, delegated projects, and represented the team in executive meetings.
  • Managed core banking support (Oracle FLEXCUBE), coached staff, and handled Oracle SQL data operations.
  • Configured and maintained VPNs & firewalls; performed security audits and vulnerability assessments.
  • Coordinated with international partners (e.g., Oracle & Mastercard) to enhance banking systems.
